document.docAuthor: Don, Bel Lar Ri, Ers, Enne Th Ba Ut & Reynde, Ma Rc
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic changes in C Cyperus (Cypereae, Cyperoideae, Cyperaceae): combining the sedge genera Ascolepis, Kyllinga and Pycreus into Cyperus s. l.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomic changes in C Cyperus (Cypereae, Cyperoideae, Cyperaceae): combining the sedge genera Ascolepis, Kyllinga and Pycreus into Cyperus s. l.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Basionym :
Kyllinga mindorensis Steud., Syn. Pl. Glumac.
2: 67 ( Steudel 1854 ).

Type :— PHILIPPINES . Luzon : Calabarzon , Batangas , 1841,
Cuming 1558
( holotype BM000959042!, isotypes K000290929!, P00578843!)
.

paragraph.subSubSection:
Synonyms: —
Scirpus cephalotes Jacquin (1771: 42)
, nom. illeg., non
S. cephalotes Linnaeus (1762: 76)
≡
Kyllinga cephalotes (Jacq.) Druce (1917: 630)
, non
Cyperus cephalotes Vahl (1805: 311)
.

Thryocephalon nemorale J.R.Forster & G. Forster (1775: 129
, pl. 65) ≡
Kyllinga nemoralis (J.R.Forster & G.Forster) Dandy ex Hutchinson & Dalziel (1936: 487)
, non
Cyperus nemoralis Chermezon (1921: 553)
.

subSubSection.materialsCitation:
Type:— FRENCH POLYNESIA . Tahiti:
J.R. Forster & G. Forster s.n.
( lectotype BM000990844!).

paragraph.subSubSection:
Kyllinga monocephala Stokes (1812: 120)
nom. illeg., non
K. monocephala Rottbøll (1773: 13)
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks:
K. monocephala Rottb.
is a superfluous name. It is a homotypic synonym of
Rhynchospora colorata (Linneaus) Pfeiffer (1935: 89)
and has
Schoenus coloratus Linnaeus (1753: 43)
as basionym.
Cyperus kyllingia Endlicher (1842: 94)
is the homotypic synonym of
K. monocephala Rottb.
and consequently this name is also a homotypic synonym of
R. colorata
.

Kyllinga monocephala var. subtriceps Kunth (1837: 130)
≡
Cyperus kyllingia f. subtriceps (Kunth) Kükenthal (1936: 608)
.

paragraph.subSubSection:
Kyllinga gracilis Zollinger (1854: 63)
nom. illeg., non
K. gracilis Kunth (1837: 134)
.

Cyperus leucocephalus Hasskarl (1848: 87)
nom. illeg., non
C. leucocephalus Retzius (1788: 11)
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Kyllinga monocephala var. humilis Boeckeler (1868: 429)
≡
Cyperus kyllingia f. humilis (Boeckeler) Kükenthal (1936: 608)
.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Syntypes :— GUAM .
Haenke s.n.
(not located); s.l., Herb. Link s.n. (not located).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Kyllinga monocephala var. tenuis Boeckeler (1868: 429)
≡
Cyperus kyllingia f. tenuis (Boeckeler) Kükenthal (1936: 608)
.

Syntypes :— MARIANA ISLANDS .
Gaudichaud s.n.
(not located); INDONESIA . Timor :
Gaudichaud s.n
. (not located)
.

paragraph.subSubSection:
Kyllinga monocephala var. latifolia Boeckeler (1868: 429)
≡
Kyllinga seychellarum
A. Jussieu ex C.B.Clarke ( Clarke 1894: 531 ) ≡
Kyllinga planiculmis Boivin ex C.B.Clarke ( Clarke 1894: 531 )
≡
Cyperus kyllingia var. latifolius (Boeckeler) Kükenthal
(1936: 608 p. p.).

,

≡

.
